attributes.action: change the law so it is not illegal to use a mobile phone when your car is in a stationary position.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Drivers should not have to switch of their engine to make a phone call when stuck in traffic. As long as the car is not moving and from making the phone call does not result in holding up cars behind, surely there is not problem in making a phone call to home or work etc for saying you are going to be late for example.
